attributes.action: Safe and Secure Parking For Hgvs in the uk.
attributes.additional_details:
We need Safe and Secure Parking For truck drivers throughout the UK

I would like the Governments Department of transport to look into providing designated service facilities throughout the UK for truck drivers. More affordable service facilities should be made available with Showers and to allow drivers to rest adequately and safely. Hgv drivers are the Lifeline of this country and deserve to be treated with a certain level of respect. They should be provided with more service areas than they are currently and secure parking for trucks,
